channel.title: Running a .sh file!?!?!
channel.description:
I have a dedicated server and I'm in the ssh client trying to run this .sh file, how would I?
How would I run a .sh file named "run" or "run.sh"? What would i type?
Any HELP?!?!

item.title: Running a .sh file!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @pwnm30rdi3 pwnm30rdi3
item.description:
@pwnm30rdi3 wrote:

i got that but now i have an error

I’m having trouble looping the .sh file…

and i get this weird
:command not founder

Here is whats inside the .sh:

#!/bin/sh
clear
#Should really add this to 

/home/pwnm30rdi3/.bashrc
export PATH=/usr/lib/jvm/java-6-sun:$PATH
java -Xmx1024m -classpath . server
sleep

I removed sleep and it started the server with sleep in the .sh file it wont run… but i can’t loop the file![br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2008, 07:01:30 PM[/size][hr]Thug please read my pm…

Read full topic
